channel.title: Games & Projects on NODRAGEM GAMES
channel.description: Recent content in Games & Projects on NODRAGEM GAMES

item.title: The Prabbits: Happy Dogfights!
item.description: Download Follow us: Watch couchplay sessions with my friends on Youtube. Come play with us and get the latest news on Discord. You can also follow the development on Twitter. Release Notes You can find the detail of the last updates here: What’s New in the Free Version of Happy Dogfigths 0.2.0 Description Happy Dogfight is a multiplayer 2D dogfight game to play with friends (2-4 players) on a couch or online.

item.title: Bubble Troop
item.description: Your browser does not support iframes. Please try the game here: https://proto-bubble-squad.herokuapp.com Camera movement could not be implemented in this version, you may need to drag the camera around to find your bubble troop. This is a multiplayer game, you can open two tabs to play it against yourselve. Controls This game is compatible with mobile devices and desktop computers: Click on the ground and drag to move the camera Click on a bubble and drag to catapult it Click on the top-left icon to enable fullscreen Collide with a friend to heal it Collide with an ennemy to hurt it If for some reason the controls are still not working try refresh the page or go back to the previous page and click on the link again.

item.title: Cannon Shooter
It's a Match!
item.description: Your browser does not support iframes. Please try the game here: https://nodragem.itch.io/john-space Controls Click on the game to enable the keyboard inputs. KEYBOARD ARROWS to move If for some reason the controls are still not working try refresh the page or go back to the previous page and click on the link again. Credits Extract of the game made for the GWJam 2017 (Theme: 2 is better than 1) in collaboration with:

item.title: Catch The Crown!
item.description: Download Windows, portable version (zip-file) Linux, portable version (zip-file) Mac OS, portable version (zip-file) I could not actually test the Mac / Linux versions. Please let me know if the game does not run on your platform. Release Notes Relase Notes of The Prabbits: Catch the Crown description The Prabbits: Catch The Crown is a local multiplayer arena platform game. Four teenager Prabbits - half parrot / half rabbit creatures - are undertaking their “Coming-of-Age” ritual.

item.title: John Space
item.description: Your browser does not support iframes. Please try the game here: https://nodragem.itch.io/john-space Controls Click on the game to enable the keyboard inputs. LEFT and RIGHT to move SPACE to jump LEFT CONTROL to sprint If for some reason the controls are still not working try refresh the page or go back to the previous page and click on the link again. Credits Made with: libGDX (Game Engine): https://libgdx.
